targets.expr: max by (instance, device) ((disk_inodes_used{instance=~"^$Instance$", env=~"^$Env", role=~"^$Role", path!~"^(/dev|/run|/sys).*$", device=~".*"} / disk_inodes_total{instance=~"^$Instance$", env=~"^$Env", role=~"^$Role", path!~"^(/dev|/run|/sys).*$", device=~".*"}) * 100)
max by (instance, path) (disk_total{instance=~"^$Instance$", env=~"^$Env", role=~"^$Role", path!~"^(/dev|/run|/sys).*$", device=~".*"})
max by (instance, path) (disk_used{instance=~"^$Instance$", env=~"^$Env", role=~"^$Role", path!~"^(/dev|/run|/sys).*$", device=~".*"})
